message.body: We could do this easily
Does your backyard facilitate such activities.
My backyard does facilitate such activities. We would like to do some slate work next year and a terraced patio.
Count me in for whatever it is you need me for.
Probably need to submit a permit applicatuon
Do you have existing?
Only need permit for decks and permanent structures. Patio/walls/plants don't fall under this. Pays to check anyway.
We did. Haverford township is permit crazy.
We have a large deck which we need to rehab. A yard. And a shed.
If your not doing anything tomorrow you should come by.
Also planning on replacing our chain link with a six foot split rail with interior wire (for the dogs).
Township won't let you have a fence over 6 ft unless it is over 50% transparent.
You could do a hard fence with 50% covered on one side and the opposing 50% covered on the other. Still private although you can see through a small amount at a diagonal.
Technically 50% transparent.
The trick is in the words right.
Kind of like the design we've been thinking of. It's hard to describe.
True.
It helps we get along with the neighbors
You should come over
I'll try for tomorrow but I have a couple things already in the works. Maybe early afternoon.
Say 2/3ish
Right off Aubrey Ave.
Just let us know when you're on your way
What's your status?
I just got home from bike ride. Need to shower then head over, would sometime during the week be better? I don't have a lot of time today. I can only stop by for 10-15 tips
Tops*
I'll be in Texas from Monday to Friday. 10 15 min would be fine with us if it would be worth the drive to you.
I'll shower and head over. Text you when I'm on 30.
Sounds good.
Be there in 10
Cool
